wikipedia_page.main: Gilbert Joshua Spencer-Smith (17 December 1843 – 2 February 1928) was an English first-class cricketer who represented Hampshire in one first-class match in 1864 against Sussex in Hampshire's first season as a first-class county club.

response: Spencer-Smith's twin brother, Joshua Spencer-Smith, represented Hampshire in a single first-class match in 1864.
*Joshua Spencer-Smith, cricketer, was born in Fareham
* Orlando Spencer-Smith (1843–1920), English cricketer, brother of Joshua Spencer-Smith
